events.name: Satanic Panic Sunday
events.description: Satanic Panic Sunday is a compilation of archived videos, presentations, and outright lunacy from the heart of the Satanic Panic - Grey Faction

events.name: Live from Salem: Songs of Heresy and Blasphemy
WTF is Witchcraft
events.description: Witchcraft for atheists. Everything from its ancient roots to modern branches. -Thomas Vallor

events.name: Sunday Supper
events.description: Adam (Satanic Chef) will be educating on the basics of how to make the perfect tomato sauce, how to make the best meatballs with their choice of protein and a baked ziti with an awesome Caesar salad.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry
events.description: Meet your new best friend, a fruit bat or insect bat from BatWorld, a shelter in Texas that cares for these sweethearts. Learn more about their work at batworld.org

events.name: Library
events.description: The Satanic Panic Archive Library is open all night. Many of these texts exist nowhere else in the world.

events.name: Infernal Goat Nursery
events.description: Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org
